summary: Workflow bundle size increased by approximately 1.5MB in version 1.8.1 due to an unintended dependency on the protobuf package being imported in workflow.ts, causing bundle bloat.
userImpact: Users experience significantly larger workflow bundles in production, increasing deployment size and latency by over 200%.
rootCause: Unintended dependency on the protobuf package was added to workflow.ts in version 1.8.1
keyQuote: The workflow bundle size increased by ~1.5 MB between TS SDK 1.8.0 and 1.8.1.
